org.openjdk.tools.javac.comp

接口 Check.CheckContext

  • 封闭类:
    Check

    public static interface Check.CheckContext
    A check context is an object that can be used to perform compatibility checks - depending on the check context, meaning of 'compatibility' might vary significantly.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Warner checkWarner(JCDiagnostic.DiagnosticPosition pos, Type found, Type req)
      Obtain a warner for this check context
      boolean compatible(Type found, Type req, Warner warn)
      Is type 'found' compatible with type 'req' in given context
      org.openjdk.tools.javac.comp.DeferredAttr.DeferredAttrContext deferredAttrContext()
